COMMENT_TX: $Stan Lopata should have scored easily on the play, and was being waved home by 3B coach Eddie Sawyer, but he froze and remained at 3B
$Sam Jethroe kicked the ball out of Willie Jones' glove when he slid into 3B; the ball rolled to the wall where it was picked up by a fan; fan interference was called
$ball four to Eddie Waitkus got away from Ebba St. Claire
DWS: bogus FLE2 but Westrum needs error in this game
rain started
24 minute rain delay
$no one covered HP on foul
ej,lowrp101,P,dascf901,Called third strike Peanuts Lowrey ejected by HP umpire Frank Dascoli
$game called for darkness; Reds manager Luke Sewell protested saying the top of the 8th no darker than the 7th

ej,durol101,M,stewb901,Catch/trap call (Threw dirt) ej,kennm101,P,stewb901,Catch/trap call ej,wilsg101,P,stewb901,Catch/trap call Giants Manager Leo Durocher ejected by 2B umpire Bill Stewart claiming the ball was trapped; Monty Kennedy and George Wilson ejected by Stewart from the bench
ej,perkc101,C,gorea901,Call at 3B $Giants manager Leo Durocher started a four-day suspension; Phillies Coach Cy Perkins ejected by 3B umpire Artie Gore arguing a call at 3B sometime in the game
ej,meyer101,P,gorea901,Balls and strikes Russ Meyer ejected by 3B umpire Artie Gore after being removed from the game
$Pete Castiglione called for obstruction
$Vern Bickford suffered fractured middle finger on his throwing hand
suspended,19520907,PHI11,curfew $Suspended for curfew at this point, completed the next day
$Richie Ashburn called for interference
